p: Yellow-colored essential oil (yield 1.6% v/w) was obtained by hydrodistillation method and analyzed using GC/MS. Table 1 shows the obtained results by the GC/MS analysis of C. zeylanicum essential oil. Thirteen compounds were identified, which represented 98.93% of the total oil. The main components were cinnamaldehyde (91.8%), ρ-metoxicinamate (1.57%), and α-pinene (1.25%).
